author: wrowe
msg: The last transpostion of ->timeout into apr_time fixed a bug identified

based timeout within the timeval structure usec member.
This patch fixes the only exception to needing the timeout_ms.  NOTICE

author: wrowe
msg: Implement the win32 apr_socket_timeout_set/get, and accomodate both the
local timeout_ms and the common timeout field definitions.
